name: Security Test Case Template
description: Template for security test cases in healthcare applications

structure.title: Security Test: [vulnerability]
structure.description: Test for [vulnerability] vulnerability to ensure data security and privacy
structure.expected_results: System should prevent [vulnerability] and respond appropriately with [expected_response]

placeholders.[vulnerability]: The specific vulnerability being tested, e.g., 'SQL injection'
placeholders.[malicious_action]: The malicious action to perform, e.g., 'inject SQL commands'
placeholders.[expected_response]: The expected system response, e.g., 'error message and request rejection'

sql_injection.title: Security Test: SQL Injection Vulnerability
sql_injection.description: Test for SQL injection vulnerability in login form
sql_injection.expected_results: System should reject the request and show generic error message without revealing database structure
